baseline_dag.description: Baseline DAG with TP=8, PP=2 - Corrected to remove duplicate edges and cycles

optimized_dag.description: Optimized DAG with layer-wise partitioning - Corrected residual connections to avoid cycles

baseline_dag_corrections: Removed duplicate edges that created cycles
Ensured all nodes have proper input/output connectivity
optimized_dag_corrections: Fixed residual connection patterns to avoid cycles
Maintained sequential pipeline flow across GPUs

deployment_specifications.hardware: 16 NVIDIA H100 GPUs with cache constraints
deployment_specifications.device_mapping: 4 GPUs actively used with 4 layers each
